events.message: We have received your application for the Software Developer position and will review your qualifications shortly.
Your application has been categorised under the Engineering cluster based on your experience with software development.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to guide you through the next steps of the hiring process.
We conducted an initial screening call to discuss your background and assess your fit for the software engineer position.
Thank you for your timely response and willingness to participate in the technical interview.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 10th at 2 PM UTC to evaluate your coding and problem-solving skills.
You successfully completed the technical interview; the interviewers were impressed with your software development expertise.
An HR interview has been arranged for May 15th at 10 AM UTC to discuss your career goals and cultural fit with the company.
You completed the HR interview successfully, showing great alignment with our company values and team culture.
We have proposed a job offer for the Software Developer role, including salary and benefits details for your consideration.
You provided positive feedback about the offer and have expressed enthusiasm about joining our engineering team.
You have formally accepted the offer, and we are excited to welcome you aboard as a new software engineer.
Your onboarding process has begun, including access to development tools and introductory meetings with your new team.
The recruitment process is now officially closed, and your hiring as a software developer is complete.
